# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`cni_plugins`](#cni_plugins): This is the main (and currently only) class for managing CNI plugins for the CNI plugins module

## Classes

### <a name="cni_plugins"></a>`cni_plugins`

This class downloads, extracts, and manages versions for the CNI plugins
archives.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include cni_plugins
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `cni_plugins` class:

* [`version`](#-cni_plugins--version)
* [`install_root`](#-cni_plugins--install_root)
* [`install_root_mode`](#-cni_plugins--install_root_mode)
* [`install_root_owner`](#-cni_plugins--install_root_owner)
* [`install_root_group`](#-cni_plugins--install_root_group)

##### <a name="-cni_plugins--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

The version of the CNI plugins to install (default: 1.6.2)

Default value: `'1.6.2'`

##### <a name="-cni_plugins--install_root"></a>`install_root`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

The root into which the cni plugins should be installed (default: /opt/cni)

Default value: `'/opt/cni'`

##### <a name="-cni_plugins--install_root_mode"></a>`install_root_mode`

Data type: `Stdlib::Filemode`

The permissions to give the install root directory (default: 0755)

Default value: `'0755'`

##### <a name="-cni_plugins--install_root_owner"></a>`install_root_owner`

Data type: `String`

The owner for the install root directory (default: root)

Default value: `'root'`

##### <a name="-cni_plugins--install_root_group"></a>`install_root_group`

Data type: `String`

The group for the install root directory (default: root)

Default value: `'root'`
